title: Constant Disconnects
body: So today my friends and I were playing a few games and were constantly being disconnected for variable amounts of time and lost quite a few games because of it. We're all in western Canada but quite far apart. Our internet functioned fine for everything except league, but even our pings in league were 20-30 ms higher than usual. Nothing seems to have fixed it.

replies.body:
Hmmmm I've been getting a few different reports of players not being able to maintain a stable connection to our game servers who all just so happen to be using Shaw Communication. Let me know if this is the ISP you're using as well so we can look into this trend.

In the meantime, let's go ahead and troubleshoot your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) just in case. You may need to double check your port forwarding and make sure to flush your DNS as well.
Thanks for the reply! It seems fine now, and yes we are all on Shaw. Appreciate the help though!

Yep me 2, shaw cable, when the disconnection happens i cant even access the riot websites.

Yes, Western Canada as well
